tools package¶

Submodules¶

tools.Utils module¶

The Utils module provides helper functions to be used with other classes relating to data manipulation.

tools.Utils.convert_raw_data_to_df(raw_data)¶

Converts CSV-formatted raw data into a Pandas data frame

Parameters:raw_data (string) – location of CSV-formatted raw data
Returns:Data as dataframe
Return type:dataframe
tools.Utils.create_folder_if_not_exists(folder)¶

Create a folder if it does not already exist.

Parameters:folder (string) – location of folder
tools.Utils.get_detector_fields(cfg_file)¶

Add date/time fields to the detector fields.

Parameters:cfg_file (string) – location of configuration file.
Returns:Dataframe with date/time fields
Return type:dataframe
tools.Utils.get_io_list_from_config(file)¶

Get list of detector I/O names and their IDs via a given configuration file.

Parameters:file (string) – location of configuration file
Returns:List of I/O names
Return type:list[str]
tools.Utils.get_latest_dataset()¶

Return the latest dataset (generic, i.e. dataset.csv file as created by the PreProcessing module).

Returns:Location of the latest generic dataset
Return type:string
tools.Utils.get_latest_dataset_folder()¶
Return the location of the latest dataset in the ‘results’ folder.
Returns:Location of the latest dataset
Return type:string
tools.Utils.get_sklearn_X_y(file, duration, datetime)¶

Return x and y values to be used with the scikit-learn framework.

Parameters:
  • file (string) – Location of the latest scikit-learn dataset
  • duration (boolean) – Indicates whether dataset contains duration data
  • datetime (boolean) – Indicates whether dataset contains timestamped records
Returns:

x and y values for scikit-learn model as individual dataframes
Return type:

dataframe, dataframe
Raises:

ValueError – if both duration and date/time are set to True.
tools.Utils.get_sklearn_data_with_duration()¶

Return the latest scikit-learn dataset with duration data.

Returns:Location of the latest scikit-learn dataset with duration data.
Return type:string
tools.Utils.get_sklearn_data_with_io()¶

Return data the latest scikit-learn dataset with I/O data.

Returns:Location of the latest scikit-learn dataset with I/O data.
Return type:string
tools.Utils.get_sklearn_data_without_io()¶

Return data the latest scikit-learn dataset without I/O data.

Returns:Location of the latest scikit-learn dataset without I/O data.
Return type:string
tools.Utils.print_number_records(file)¶

Print out the number of records in a given CSV file.

Parameters:file – location of the CSV-formatted file
